channel.title: Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: woah
item.description: my friend kwishot is in iraq. kwishot (5:16:57 AM): you awake? kwishot (5:17:16 AM): Well…if not….just sayin hi kwishot (5:17:22 AM): I’m in Fallujah right now! =) kwishot (5:17:27 AM): Back for round 2, I guess! i hope he stays safe.
